mapper.select:
SELECT a.label_id as "labelid", a.label_value as "labelvalue", (select count(t.id) from cms_label_conn_arti t,cms_article r where t.label_id=a.label_id and r.id=t.article_id and r.del_flag='0' ) as "countarticle", (select count(u.id) from cms_label_conn_user u,sys_user s where u.user_id=s.id and s.del_flag='0' and u.label_id=c.label_id ) as "countuser" FROM CMS_LABEL_CONN_USER c, CMS_LABEL a WHERE c.user_id=#{userid}
and a.label_id = c.label_id
and a.LABEL_VALUE Like '%'||#{labelvalue}||'%'
order by a.CREATEDATE desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CMS_LABEL_CONN_USER WHERE LABEL_ID=#{labelid} and USER_ID=#{userid}
